polygon.name: Rebalancing [BTC]
polygon.description: A self-balancing strategy targeting an allocation of 60% BTC and 40% USDC
polygon.detail: Provides a good exposure to BTC. Allows to acquire more at lower prices and offload some risk at higher prices.
polygon.scope: Works best during periods of significant market volatility, in either direction.

polygon.name: Rebalancing [ETH]
polygon.description: A self-balancing strategy targeting an allocation of 60% ETH and 40% USDC
polygon.detail: Provides a good exposure to ETH. Allows to acquire more at lower prices and offload some risk at higher prices.
polygon.scope: Works best during periods of significant market volatility, in either direction.

polygon.name: Mean Reversion [BTC]
polygon.description: Strategy dollar-cost averaging in and out BTC according to its long-term trend
polygon.detail: Designed to accumulate BTC when its price is significantly undervalued, and progressively divest when it's significantly overvalued.
polygon.scope: Works best when the market is forming a bottom or a top.

polygon.name: Mean Reversion [ETH]
polygon.description: Strategy dollar-cost averaging in and out ETH according to its long-term trend
polygon.detail: Designed to accumulate ETH when its price is significantly undervalued, and progressively divest when it's significantly overvalued.
polygon.scope: Works best when the market is forming a bottom or a top.

polygon.name: Trend Following [BTC]
polygon.description: Strategy allocating to BTC during an uptrend and to USDC otherwise
polygon.detail: Allows to capture value in BTC during uptrends, and sell into USDC during downtrends.
polygon.scope: Works best when there is a defined trend in the market.

polygon.name: Trend Following [ETH]
polygon.description: Strategy allocating to ETH during an uptrend and to USDC otherwise
polygon.detail: Allows to capture value in ETH during uptrends, and sell into USDC during downtrends.
polygon.scope: Works best when there is a defined trend in the market.
